ksql: CREATE STREAM "wallbox_charge" WITH (VALUE_FORMAT='AVRO') AS SELECT PAYLOAD AS CHARGE, REGEXP_EXTRACT('(.*)/(.*)/(.*)', MQTT_TOPIC, 1) AS CLIENT_ID_KEY, AS_VALUE(REGEXP_EXTRACT('(.*)/(.*)/(.*)', MQTT_TOPIC, 1)) AS CLIENT_ID, ROWTIME AS TIMESTAMP FROM "wallbox_source_stream" WHERE REGEXP_EXTRACT('(.*)/(.*)/(.*)', MQTT_TOPIC, 3)='charge' AND REGEXP_EXTRACT('(.*)/(.*)/(.*)', MQTT_TOPIC, 2)='out' PARTITION BY REGEXP_EXTRACT('(.*)/(.*)/(.*)', MQTT_TOPIC, 1);
